content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft an oak_fence_gate, I need to first craft oak_planks. Oak_planks are made by placing stripped_oak_wood in the crafting grid, therefore I will move the stripped_oak_wood from slot 20 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: I have now crafted oak_planks, and will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to craft oak_fence_gate. Oak_fence_gate is made by placing 2 oak_planks on top of each other with a stick in between. I will start by moving a stick into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Next I need to place an oak_plank above the stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Next I need to place a stick below the oak_plank.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Next I need to place a stick to the right of the oak_plank.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Next I need to place an oak_plank to the right of the stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Next I need to place a stick below the oak_plank.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the oak_fence_gate by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
